result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Torrey J Cavolt

records.addlTxt:
9:11 AM Defendant Torrey J Cavolt in court.  Prosecuting attorney Frank John Remington in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant indicated they qualify for SPD but has not yet had counsel appointed, requested adjournment. No objection by State.
Status conference scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on November 18, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall not use/possess controlled substances or drug paraphernalia without a valid prescription. 
- Defendant shall not operate a motor vehicle without a valid license. 
Parties stipulated to waive the time limits for Preliminary Hearing.
Trial Judge - Br 2

1:55 PM Defendant Torrey J Cavolt in court, in custody.  Attorney Guy Cardamone in court for Torrey J Cavolt.  Prosecuting attorney Thersa Louise Lewandowski in court for the State of Wisconsin. The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.
Status conference scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on October 14, 2022 at 09:00 am.
